omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select
    distinct
    b.PatientId,
    a.DiagnosisCode,
    a.Start_date as event_start_date,
    a.End_date as event_end_date
from
    omop_staging.RTDS_5_Diagnosis_Course a
left join
    omop_staging.rtds_1_demographics b
    on a.id = b.id
where
    b.patientid is not null
    and b.patientid not like '%[^0-9]%'
	and a.DiagnosisTableName = 'ICD-10'

omopColumns.name: condition_source_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Resolve ICD10 codes to standard or non standard OMOP concepts. If code cannot be mapped, map using the parent code.
omopColumns.query:
select
    distinct
    b.PatientId,
    a.DiagnosisCode,
    a.Start_date as event_start_date,
    a.End_date as event_end_date
from
    omop_staging.RTDS_5_Diagnosis_Course a
left join
    omop_staging.rtds_1_demographics b
    on a.id = b.id
where
    b.patientid is not null
    and b.patientid not like '%[^0-9]%'
	and a.DiagnosisTableName = 'ICD-10'

omopColumns.name: condition_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Maps concepts to standard valid concepts in the `condition` domain.

omopColumns.name: condition_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32818`. `EHR Administration record`
